name: SK8
description: SK8 is a physics-based hardcore 2D platformer with a punishing difficulty curve which encourages a careful approach. Roll your way to the top and become a true sk8r!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 2.4Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 650 MB available space
